data.title: 10 Most underrated Music Directors in Tollywood
data.meta_description: This article is all about 10 most underrated music directors from Tollywood who gave exceptionally good music. Their songs can touch every music lover heart. We chose most underrated 10 music directors and explained their music in Telugu. 10 most underrated Music directors in Tollywood.
data.text:
Mana Tollywood lo Chaala mandhi Music Directors vaccharu poyaaru. But kondharu maathram marchipoleni songs iccharu. Vaallalo Kondharu Top Music directors ayyaru. Mari kondharu underrated music directors ayyaaru. Entha underrated ante vaallu compose chesina Music manaki gurthu untundhi kaani, Music Director Name manaki teliyakapovacchu. Alanti vaalla kosam ee chinna Information.

(Music on cheyyandi mari üòú)

#10 Achu Rajamani (Acchu)

Mundhuga manam Acchu gurinchi matladukundhaam. Eeyana Tamil lo one of the busiest music director. But, eeyana Native emo Malayali. The Great Mayalam Music Director B. A. Chidambaranath gaari Grandson annamaata.

Ithani native Kerala but, Music director ga debut mathram Telugu movie tho chesaadu. Anthaka mundhu oka Malayali Movie ki BGM compose chesaadule. Telugu Debut movie emo Nenu Meeku Telusa. Appatlo ee Movie lo oka song Youth ki picchekkinchindi. ‚ÄúYenno Yenno.. Yennenno Yenno‚Äù antuu vacche ee song ippatiki kuda chaala mandhi Favourite.

Aah tarwatha Manchu Manoj ki Potugadu, Current teega tho musical hit icchadu.

Songs to Listen:

#9 Rahul Raj

Rahul Raj Malayali lo one of the best music director. Telugu lo chesindi rendu movies ye aina, gurthundipoye music ichhaadu. Andhulo one of the best musical hit movie Oh my friend. Appatlo ee movie audio release aina tarwatha within 9 days lo more than 3 lakh CD‚Äôs sale ayyaayi.

Next Paatashala movie ki melodious music ichadu. Ee feel good movie ki Rahul Raj music big plus ane cheppocchu.

Songs to Listen:

#8 Shekhar Chadra

Anasuya Movie tho debut chesi Nacchavule, Manasara, Nuvvila, Avunu, Ekkadiki pothaavu chinnavada ila chaala manchi musical hits unnayi. Okka songs ye kakunda BGM composing lo kuda thop eeyana. Recent ga vacchina 118 movie ki pranam posaadu. His songs are worth listening.

Songs To Listen:

#7 Sai Karthik

Vandematharam Srinivas, Koti, Mani Sharma, S.P Balu, Devisri Prasad, R.P. Patnaik laanti music directors daggara work chesi, thanakantu oka brand create cheskunna music director Sai Karthik. Ithanu chesina songs lo manchi oopu untundi. Abbo Aadavaallu Movie tho debut chesi Supreme, Raja The Great, Paisa, Bham Bolenath, Raju Gari Gadhi, Patas ila chaala movies ki Music compose chesaadu.

Songs To Listen:

#6 Raghu Kunche

Bumper offer Movie lo Endhukey Ramanamma antuu Tollywood audience ni oka oopesina Raghu kunche the most underrated Music director ane cheppali. Telugu, Tamil, Kannada kalipi mottham 10 Movies ki work chesina eeyana oka TV Anchor ga andhariki telusu. Eeyana Telugu serials lo kuda act chesadu.

Recent ga Internet lo viral aina Baby ane Village singer ki Matti Manishinamma Nenu ane song paadisthu oka video pettaru. Daggaraga Dooramga, Devudu Chesina Manushulu, Dongata, Mama Manchu Alludu Kanchu ila oka 10 movies ki music director ga work chesaadu.

Songs To Listen:

#5 Sunny MR

Fresh music ki care of Address Sunny MR. Swami Rara, Uyyala Jampala movie hit venuka ithani music gattiga pani chesindhi ane cheppocchu. Keshava, Bhale Machi Roju, Rowdy Fellow movies lo BGM kuda oka range lo icchadu. Ithani Native Patna, Bihar. Chaala Bollywood movies ki Sound Designer, Engineer ga work chesadu kani music director ga break mathram Tollywood lo vacchindi.

Songs To Listen:

#4 KM Radhakrishnan

Initial ga oka 2 movies ki work chesaadu kani, Shekhar Kammula Anand movie tho full ga shine ayyadu. Ala aagipokunda Godavari, Chandamama, Siddu From Srikakulam, Baladhur ila enno musical hits icchadu. Okka matalo cheppalante ithani Songs vintu unte Haayiga untundi. Ippatiki Anand, Godavari, Chandamama albums best classical hits.

Songs To Listen:

#3 Radhan

Andala Rakshasi tho debut chesi Radha, Arjun Reddy, Husharu movies tho manchi Music icchadu. Main ga Arjun Reddy lo Break up song, Husharu Movie lo ‚ÄòUndiporadhe‚Äô songs tho youth ni oka range lo attract chesaadu.

Ithani Songs lo speciality enti ante, ithani songs anni slow poison laga youth brain ki ekkesthaayi.

Songs To Listen:

#2 Sandeep Chowta

Ninne Pelladutha tho debut chesi aah next Chandralekha, Prema Katha, Super, Bujjigadu, Josh ila cheppukuntu pothe Telugu lo oka 10 Movies ki work chesaadu. Vaatilo 5 movies King Nagarjuna Involve ayyi unnaru. Ninne Pelladutha Movie songs ippatiki kuda almost andhari Favourite songs.

Manodini chaala underrate chesthunanru kani Chance isthe music ni dummu leputhaadu. Melody, Romatic, Mass, Dance ila ye song aina oka range lo kodthaadu.

Songs To Listen:

#1 Kalyan Koduri

From M.M Keeravani‚Äôs Brother to Music Director Kalyan Koduri. Eeyana Journey lo chalane ups and downs unnai. But music composition lo mathram Annaki thagga thammudu anipinchukunnadu. Initial ga Amrutham lanti serials ki Title song compose chesthu chinna chinna serials ki compose chesthu ‚ÄòAithe‚Äô movie tho break tecchukunnadu.

‚ÄúChitapata chinukulu ara chethullo‚Äù ane okka song tho Music lovers ni attract chesaadu. Akkada nundi Ashta chamma, Ala Modalaindhi, Golconda High school, Oohalu Gusagusalaade, Lakshmi‚Äôs NTR ila 10+ movies ki Music icchadu. Konni Awards kuda receive cheskunnadu.

Famous comedy serial Amrutham title song compose chesi paadindh kuda eeyane.

Songs To Listen:

If you feel the same about them and enjoy their songs, please share this to your friends.
